message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $95. I believe it would be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $85. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth a lot to me.  How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am able to offer $87 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.
